newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Audit Chamber to end Rosgosstrakh check soon.
newsitem.headline: Audit Chamber to end Rosgosstrakh check soon.

text.p: Russia's independent Audit Chamber will finish its analysis of a privatisation scheme for leading insurer OAO Rosgosstrakh after May 16, Interfax news agency quoted a chamber source as saying on Thursday.

The State Duma lower house of parliament, worried that the assets of Rosgosstrakh, Russia's largest insurer, had been undervalued, ordered the chamber to report on the results of its valuation before March 10.
Interfax quoted the source as saying the delay was due to a huge amount of work on Rosgosstrakh, which has 80 branches.
The Russian Federal Property Fund has said it would sell 50 percent of Rosgosstrakh at a cash auction this year.
Rosgosstrakh employees have subscribed for 20 percent of the remainder and its management has a priority right for a further 30 percent.
